Description: THANK YOU for choosing to look at my auction and bidding on them. Please, ADD ME TO YOUR FAVORITES as I am listing real nice items weekly. Please e-mail me with any questions and I will be glad to get back to you as soon as I can. Be sure to INCLUDE ITEM #. We would love to add you to our list of happy buyers!! If you read our feedback on past sales, you will find out many of our buyers say the item they purchased from us was better than described, so keep that in mind when reading my honest descriptions. This is a real beauty, RARE, SLIGHTLY used, 1991, in excellent condition (not perfect), with no major issues or repairs, some normal wear and aging, ALL ORIGINAL, GIBSON SG STANDARD, SPECIAL ORDER, GIBSON CUSTOM COLOR GOLD FINISH, ELECTRIC GUITAR with hardshell CASE AND PAPERS ETC. As you can see in the pics it is gorgeous. There are a few finish crazing lines in the clear over coat only and a chip in the body lower side (see pic ) it is professionally set up and ready to play. Straight neck, low action, great sound, no noticeable fret wear. One owner. The person I got it from special ordered it in gold new and only played it at home and in church. Includes truss rod wrench, case keys, warrenty, owners manual, original invoice, Shipping includes insurance, box and packing, signature delivery. HOW MANY SG'S IN GOLD HAVE YOU EVER SEEN?? THANKS ide 1(Currrent Slide)Slide 2 Showing slid mahogany neck with a rosewood fretboard plays silky smooth. Gibson 490R and 4A gorgeous Les Paul that's easy on your back. PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING: OUR POLICY IS AS FOLLOWS: Please, ask any questions early and to prior to shipping. We use mostly Priority Mail and will combine multiple purchases to save on shipping. All sizes are approximate unless stated exact. Payment to be made by PayPal only. I will only ship to a CONFIRMED ADDRESS for both parties protection thru Paypal. Payment must be received within 3 days of auction’s end. Returns only for discrepancies in the description, I must be notified within 3 days of your receiving the item and it must be properly shipped back within 30 days of receiving item in the same condition as received. Refunds will be for the purchase price. Buyer is responsible for shipping & handling charges. Insurance if wanted is extra. I cannot be responsible for items lost or damaged in shipment as insurance is offered on all auctions. PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THERE IS A PROBLEM BEFORE LEAVING NEGITIVE FEEDBACK SO I CAN DO MY BEST TO WORK IT OUT TO YOUR SATISFACTION. All items are guaranteed to be as represented, so bid with confidence. BY BIDDING ON MY ITEM YOU AGREE TO COMPLY WITH THESE TERMS. THANKS AND HAPPY BIDDING!
Title: SWEET! ORIG. 1991 "GOLD" GIBSON SG STANDARD WITH HARDCASE & PAPERS ETC SEE PICS!
